about_the_game:
LEVEL UP 80 is a captivating action game that seamlessly blends magical elements with shooter mechanics. It follows the journey of a solitary knight who dares to challenge an enormous orc army. Starting at level 1, the knight must battle through hordes of orcs, steadily leveling up to reach the ultimate level 80. As players progress, they can upgrade their character, unlock powerful spells, and wield a diverse arsenal of weapons. The goal is to eradicate the green invaders and restore peace to the land once and for all. Engage in intense combat, master magical abilities, and strategically enhance your knight to achieve victory.



Key Features:

  • Progressive Leveling System:

     Start from level 1 and advance to level 80 by defeating orc enemies and gaining experience points.

  • Dynamic Combat Mechanics:

     Engage in fast-paced battles combining melee, magic, and ranged attacks.

  • Variety of Spells and Weapons:

     Unlock and utilize a wide range of magical spells and powerful weapons to defeat the orc army.

  • Epic Storyline:

     Follow the journey of a lone knight determined to protect peaceful lands from invading orcs.

  • Strategic Upgrades:

     Customize and upgrade your knight's abilities and equipment to match your combat style and maximize effectiveness against enemies.
detailed_description:
Feature List


About the Game



LEVEL UP 80 is a captivating action game that seamlessly blends magical elements with shooter mechanics. It follows the journey of a solitary knight who dares to challenge an enormous orc army. Starting at level 1, the knight must battle through hordes of orcs, steadily leveling up to reach the ultimate level 80. As players progress, they can upgrade their character, unlock powerful spells, and wield a diverse arsenal of weapons. The goal is to eradicate the green invaders and restore peace to the land once and for all. Engage in intense combat, master magical abilities, and strategically enhance your knight to achieve victory.



Key Features:

  • Progressive Leveling System:

     Start from level 1 and advance to level 80 by defeating orc enemies and gaining experience points.

  • Dynamic Combat Mechanics:

     Engage in fast-paced battles combining melee, magic, and ranged attacks.

  • Variety of Spells and Weapons:

     Unlock and utilize a wide range of magical spells and powerful weapons to defeat the orc army.

  • Epic Storyline:

     Follow the journey of a lone knight determined to protect peaceful lands from invading orcs.

  • Strategic Upgrades:

name: LEVEL UP 80

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: LEVEL UP 80 is an action game with magic and shooter mechanics, where a lone knight must level up from 1 to 80 to defeat a massive orc army. Utilize various spells and weapons to protect peaceful lands from invaders.
